title: Tapestry hit by Kate Spade, Stuart Weitzman troubles
text:
Tapestry hit by Kate Spade, Stuart Weitzman troubles Tuesday, May 01, 2018 - 01:35
High-end handbag maker Tapestry reported lower third-quarter margins and a steeper-than-expected decline in same-store sales, sending its shares down. Aleksandra Michalska reports. â–² Hide
High-end handbag maker Tapestry reported lower third-quarter margins and a steeper-than-expected decline in same-store sales, sending its shares down. Aleksandra Michalska reports. //reut.rs/2KugUmU
